HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Made labels dark instead of light, to be more subtle. Added several Mod Options to:|* Use light text as before|* Change label opacity|* Set maximum allowed size of text.|* Set minimum size below which a label will not be drawn.|* Set furthest zoom level at which labels will be drawn.

Rooms can now be renamed, including rooms that don't normally have a role label. The 'Architecture -> Orders' menu contains a Rename button; use it click on a room to rename. Zones can also be renamed this way.
